translations: 墨守原文；拘泥于圣经原文；校勘学

sentences.sentence: Tradition is an important concept in Gadamer's textualism.
sentences.translation: “传统”是伽达默尔诠释学中一个重要的概念。

sentences.sentence: I give a special attention to the study of the text theories of the 20th Century Textualism.
sentences.translation: 尤其着力研究了“20世纪文本主义”的文本理论。
